description: I'm a loyal, trustworthy,and fun 39 year old divorced dad. There is nothing I wouldn't do for my kids. That being said, every other weekend I devote my whole weekend to them. I am looking for a woman to spend the rest of our lives together, cause I hate this dating stuff. I thought I was done with this, when I got married, but that didn't work out. I am still a believer in Love and I am Searching for my one true love. So if you like what you see and you would like to meet for coffee or something, please by all means reach out to me.
